CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 2, 1941, pg. 10 reads: "Youth and beauty enhanced the charm of the Bishop-Lavelle nuptials Saturday evening, when Miss Mabel Bishop became the bride of Frank Lavelle in Bethlehem Baptist church, McKeesport. Mr. Lavelle has been connected with the advertising department of the Pittsburgh Courier for 15 years.  The bride was a stenographer at The Courier.  The party, left to right: Bernice Pangburn, Albert Brown, Adah Moore, Robert Lavelle, Postella Gresham, Ben Frazier, the bride, the groom, Luther Trice, Marian Grimes-Cralle, Hugo J. Wynn, Charlotte Bishop.  A reception at Loendi club followed the nuptials. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women of wedding party, from left: Bernice Pangburn, Adah Moore, Postella Gresham, bride Mabel Bishop Lavelle, Marian Grimes-Cralle, and Charlotte Bishop, posed in Loendi Club
